name: places/ChIJdedyrgP2wokRmt8Od7B5hhM
adrFormatAddress: 1931 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10029-4004, USA

originalText.text: Worst dental experience ever. Dentists purpusely performed a procedure incorectly charging my insurance. I returned within a week in order to repair/repeat same procedure and was told if i payed  in cash he guaranteed it would not happen again, in the process he tampered with an other tooth causing damage that would need a root canal later. He attempted to have me return to repair the now new problem saying my insurance did not cover this new procedure. I never returned found new dentists thankfully. And my insurance DID cover all needed procedures.

originalText.text: The staff are really nice however they dont have the latest technology which isnt a big deal to me but it may be for others.

text.text: The staff are really nice however they dont have the latest technology which isnt a big deal to me but it may be for others.

originalText.text:
Terrible place! Do NOT GO HERE!!! I'm telling you as someone who has insurance they don't do their job. The dentist told me to wait for my tooth to get worse and NOW I HAVE TO DO A ROOT CANAL AND CROWN. And I only found out by going to another dentist! Don't waste your time or money they ARE TRYING TO SCAM YOU HERE

Terrible lugar! ¡¡¡NO VAYAS AQUÍ!!! Te lo digo como alguien que tiene seguro no hacen su trabajo. El dentista me dijo que esperara a que mi muela empeorara y AHORA TENGO QUE HACER UNA ENDODONCIA Y UNA CORONA. ¡Y solo me enteré yendo a otro dentista! No pierdas tu tiempo ni tu dinero ESTÁN TRATANDO DE ESTAFARTE AQUÍ
